title: Ribbon Hopf algebra
summary: A ribbon Hopf algebra ( A , m , Δ , u , ε , S , R , ν ) {\displaystyle (A,m,\Delta ,u,\varepsilon ,S,{\mathcal {R}},\nu )} is a quasitriangular Hopf algebra which possess an invertible central element ν {\displaystyle \nu } more commonly known as the ribbon element, such that the following conditions hold:
